This PR adds the continuity of multiplication. 

Co-authored-by: @D-Thomine 

---

below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they

```suggestion
  convert h.comp continuous_swap.continuousAt (x := (b, a))
  simp [mul_comm]
```
Just a little golf. Not really important, but just to show some tricks.
